arts.ttl: OGC Nice predicted XI v AS Roma: captain Dante to return
arts.sum: OGC Nice captain Dante is set to return to the starting line-up for their UEFA Europa League opener against AS Roma on Wednesday night. The Brazilian missed the 4-1 defeat…

arts.ttl: Official: Roma confirm Europa League squad for Nice and leave Dybala out
arts.sum: Roma have officially confirmed their travelling squad to take on Nice in the first round...

arts.ttl: OGC Nice receive boost ahead of Europa League clash against AS Roma
arts.sum: OGC Nice have struggled with injury problems so far this season, just as they did during the previous campaign. However, there now looks to be some let-up in those issues. …

arts.ttl: Nice vs Roma predictions: Roma to build on derby victory
arts.sum: Roma enjoyed a Serie A derby win over Lazio at the weekend and Alex Jack expects them to continue the good work at Nice in the Europa League.
